name: Adventure Academy 2: Reborn
description:
Do You Remember Him?

I Remember Him.

He Started This Inferno.

He Will Pay.

What He Did Has No Excuse.

If We Burn, He Burns With Us.

This is the Official Page of the Reborn Version of the sadly fated, Adventure Academy 2. The Game is in it's development stage, probably to release before the break of the New Year, (2017)

Itch.IO site, will have a special demo so, please be patient! :D

Main game page: http://gamejolt.com/games/adventure-academy-2-reborn/187609 [GameJolt]
